name: Drink 4 The Kids 2023
about: A mobile-only web app to help celebrate the 4th annual D4K charity party. All proceeds will go directly to The Nicholas House, an Atlanta based charity.

name: GetFit
about: A web app for fitness enthusiasts to track their main lifts and create custom workout routines.

name: SwoleMates
about: A social media app for fitness enthusiasts. Users can create posts and workouts, add friends, and like/comment on their friends' content.

name: Job Tracker
about: A responsive web app designed for users to easily keep track of any job they apply to during their search.

name: Quizard
about: A Quizlet clone, designed for users to create their own quizzes to fit their studying needs.
